welcome_message_body: Welcome to Montes Claros, Brazil! Get ready to be enchanted by the city's rich cultural heritage, vibrant local music scene, and beautiful natural surroundings. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Montes Claros has to offer.

restaurants.description: Cachorro-quente da Cleide is a hot dog joint located in Montes Claros.
restaurants.address: R. Melo Viana (Morrinhos), Montes Claros, MG
